info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 858
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 858
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	ns1-04.azure-dns.com. azuredns-hostmaster.microsoft.com. 1 3600 300 2419200 300

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9390
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9390
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	172800	IN	NS	ns1-04.azure-dns.com.
monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	172800	IN	NS	ns2-04.azure-dns.net.
monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	172800	IN	NS	ns3-04.azure-dns.org.
monpsy.sante.gouv.fr.	172800	IN	NS	ns4-04.azure-dns.info.
